bill_title: provide for the issuance of certain unused nonresident waterfowl licenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the issuance of certain unused nonresident waterfowl licenses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If any fall three-day temporary nonresident waterfowl licenses authorized pursuant to § 41-6- 18.4 that were allocated for Potter, Stanley, Sully, Hughes, and Lyman counties were unsold during the previous hunting season, a corresponding number of fall three-day temporary nonresident waterfowl licenses not to exceed two hundred licenses shall be made available for the following season to nonresidents who were born in South Dakota as documented by a birth certificate issued in South Dakota. If the number of unsold licenses for Potter, Stanley, Sully, Hughes, and Lyman counties for the previous hunting season was less than two hundred, no nonresident licenses may be issued pursuant to this section. A license issued pursuant to this section is valid statewide. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
